item.description:
Members of our group have been invited by Doug and Rita Bell to their Oct. Meetup for Supper Club of S. NH. Bring a spouse or friend if you would like. This will be a co-ed event. To be held on Friday, Oct. 19th. from 6PM to ?pm. She will email you their address as it gets closer to the date. It is in Hooksett, NH. ALL the details are on their Meetup page -
Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel members can either join their membership http://www.meetup.com/Supper_Club_of_Southern_NH/ and RSVP through that or they can email Rita directly - icookand@yahoo.com

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Join Supper Club of Southern NH for dinner
